summary: The Learn page hero source was updated to point to /assets/generated/hero-guidance-logo.dim_1600x900.png and the alt text was updated. However, the required new static asset file was not added, and unrelated hero headline text was changed (including a personal name), which is outside the requested scope.

missing_requirements.requirement: The selected hero uses a new static asset in frontend/public/assets/generated (hero-guidance-logo.dim_1600x900.png).
missing_requirements.reason: The src references the new asset path, but the diff shows no new files added, so the required image file does not appear to have been added under frontend/public/assets/generated.

hallucinated_features.description: Changed Learn page hero headline copy to include a personal name and new marketing text.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asked to replace the selected hero image and update its alt text; it explicitly constrained changes to the selected element and did not request any text/copy changes.
evidence: frontend/src/components/learn/LearnHero.tsx (h1 changed to "Hey Here is Abhishek Singh &Team Join Fast!!")

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added repository metadata summaries (frontend-file-summaries.txt) beyond the requested hero image change.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in the BuildRequest; appears to be documentation/metadata updates rather than implementing REQ-1/REQ-2.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified project tracking state (project_state.json) marking requests as pending/including additional metadata.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested as part of implementing the frontend hero image/alt text requirements.
